languages.text: {n}Кровь заливает глаза, заползает в уши и ноздри. Скользя ладонями по лицу, вы тщетно пытаетесь спастись от нее, но дышать становится все тяжелее.{/n}
{n}Blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your hands down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing becomes ever harder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кровь заливает глаза, заползает в уши и ноздри. Скользя ладонями по лицу, вы тщетно пытаетесь спастись от нее, но дышать становится все тяжелее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your palms down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing is becoming ever harder.{/n}

{n}Blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your hands down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing becomes ever harder.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Blut strömt dir in die Augen. Es kriecht in deine Ohren und deine Nasenlöcher. Du fährst dir mit den Händen übers Gesicht, versuchst vergeblich, dem Blut zu entkommen, doch das Atmen fällt dir immer schwerer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your hands down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing becomes ever harder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Blut strömt dir in die Augen. Es kriecht in deine Ohren und deine Nasenlöcher. Du fährst dir mit den Händen übers Gesicht, versuchst vergeblich, dem Blut zu entkommen, doch das Atmen fällt dir immer schwerer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La sangre llena tu vista. Se introduce por tus oídos y por tu nariz. Te pasas las manos por la cara para intentar protegerte, pero cada vez te cuesta más respirar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your hands down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing becomes ever harder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La sangre llena tu vista. Se introduce por tus oídos y por tu nariz. Te pasas las manos por la cara para intentar protegerte, pero cada vez te cuesta más respirar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}血があなたの目に流れ込む。耳と鼻腔から入り込んでくる。両手で顔を撫でおろし、力逃れようと無為な努力をするが、呼吸はますます苦しくなる一方だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your hands down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing becomes ever harder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}血があなたの目に流れ込む。耳と鼻腔から入り込んでくる。両手で顔を撫でおろし、力逃れようと無為な努力をするが、呼吸はますます苦しくなる一方だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}鲜血涌入你的双眼，钻进你的耳朵、鼻孔。你用双手抹着脸上的血，徒劳地试图挣脱，呼吸也变得越来越困难。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your hands down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing becomes ever harder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鲜血涌入你的双眼，钻进你的耳朵、鼻孔。你用双手抹着脸上的血，徒劳地试图挣脱，呼吸也变得越来越困难。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des flots de sang s'écoulent de vos yeux et ruissellent jusque dans vos oreilles et vos narines. Vous vous passez les mains sur le visage dans une vaine tentative pour y échapper, mais vous avez de plus en plus de mal à respirer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your hands down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing becomes ever harder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des flots de sang s'écoulent de vos yeux et ruissellent jusque dans vos oreilles et vos narines. Vous vous passez les mains sur le visage dans une vaine tentative pour y échapper, mais vous avez de plus en plus de mal à respirer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kan, gözlerine akın ediyor. Sinsice kulaklarına ve burun deliklerine doğru ilerliyor. Elini yüzünden aşağı kaydırarak beyhude yere kurtulmaya çalışsan bile nefes alman daha da zorlaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood floods your eyes. It creeps its way into your ears and nostrils. You slide your hands down your face, trying in vain to escape it, but breathing becomes ever harder.{/n}
